result.name: pupil_attainment_by_free_school_meal_fsm_eligibility_-_key_stage_2
result.notes:
Information about the National Curriculum Key Stage 2 (KS2) test results for pupils in maintained schools in England. The dataset includes the total number of pupils taking KS2 tests and the percentage of pupils achieving KS2 Level 4 in English, Mathematics and Science respectively. A breakdown by pupil Free School Meal (FSM) eligibility is also included.

Source: Department for Children Schools and Families (DCSF)

Publisher: Neighbourhood Statistics

Geographies: Middle Layer Super Output Area (MSOA), Local Authority District (LAD), Government Office Region (GOR), National

Geographic coverage: England

Time coverage: 2004/05 to 2007/08

Type of data: Administrative data

Notes: The dataset covers a total of 584,281 pupils.

odi-certificate.title: Pupil attainment by Free School Meal (FSM) eligibility: Key Stage 2

organization.name: department-for-children-schools-and-families
organization.title: Department for Children, Schools and Families
organization.description: DCFS is the department preceding DfE and its datasets are kept under the original name for historical purposes. Its datasets will surface in searches for DfE when the 'include sub-publishers' option is selected when searching from the DfE departmental page or when DfE is selected as a publisher in the filtering facets in the main search results page.

result.precision: #Pupils attending independent schools not included in the figure.#To protect confidentiality, cells with low counts have been suppressed. As a consequence of the suppressions applied, sums of LAD counts may not equal related GOR totals.
result.title: Pupil attainment by Free School Meal (FSM) eligibility: Key Stage 2
